title: Why doesn’t Federico start the revolussion? — Fellini caricature
inscription: Handwritten inscription: 'Perché Federico non fa la rivolussione?'
creator: Renzo Renzi
current_location: Renzo Renzi Library, Cineteca di Bologna
description: Hand-drawn caricature by Renzo Renzi portraying Federico Fellini with the humorous caption 'Perché Federico non fa la rivolussione?'. The drawing later became an emblematic image associated with the Cineteca di Bologna.
notes: Central visual reference for the project title 'The “Revolussion” of Renzo Renzi'.
